Rain of Stones

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Rain of Stones
 
(More likely to hit head)
The sky blackens and rumbling sounds echo over the battlefield. Stones and small rocks begin to fall from the heavens, striking down soldiers. Shield and other things that protect vs arrows will also protect soldiers from getting hit by the rocks. Most of the falling stones will result in head hits.
Continously targets the battle field with 5 points of mundane blunt dmg.
